component.name: TestTask
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "TestTaskMain" end sub
function TestTaskMain() while true sleep(5000) search = "hola" _url = box("https://www.google.com/search?source=hp&q=" + search)
urlReq = CreateObject("roUrlTransfer")
urlReq.SetUrl(_url) urlReq.RetainBodyOnError(true) urlReq.EnablePeerVerification(false) urlReq.EnableHostVerification(false)
'TODO: we have to assign the message port to be able to capture HTTP logs 'urlReq.SetMessagePort(m.top.messagePort)
resp = urlReq.GetToString()
print "---------> TestTask request response"
end while end function
